headline: What The Q3 Narrative Shift Means For Martin Marietta Materials's Valuation
summary: What the New Fair Value Estimate Signals Analysts have nudged their modeled fair value for Martin Marietta Materials to US$676.43 from US$666.29, paired with a nearly unchanged 8.21% discount rate that keeps the core risk view steady. The forecast now blends slightly softer revenue growth of 7.22% versus 7.34% with a modestly higher implied valuation, reflecting the push and pull between optimism around Q3 themes like volume recovery and infrastructure demand, and caution around weather and...
